mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.code AS "code", a.addtime AS "addtime", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM runmonitor a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO runmonitor( id, name, code, addtime, lastupdate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{addtime}, #{lastupdate} )
